mapper.insert: insert into reply_tb (comment, board_id, user_id, created_at) values (#{comment}, #{boardId}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT rt.id reply_id, rt.comment, rt.user_id, rt.board_id, ut.username FROM REPLY_TB rt right outer join user_tb ut on rt.user_id = ut.id where rt.board_id = ${boardId}
